Title: Importance of Click-Through Rate (CTR) on Xiaohongshu
Content: The click-through rate (CTR) is a crucial metric on Xiaohongshu, as it determines whether your content will be pushed to a broader audience. When you publish a post, the platform initially shows it to a targeted group based on the tags associated with your content. The CTR, which is the ratio of users who click on your post to those who see it, is akin to the 'watch-through rate' on Douyin. If your post achieves a high CTR, Xiaohongshu will push it to more users. Therefore, creating an eye-catching cover and a compelling title is essential. These elements are the first things users see and significantly influence their decision to click. Common strategies to improve CTR include using visually appealing images and clear, concise titles that promise valuable content. For instance, using 'before and after' images or highlighting key benefits can attract more clicks. By focusing on improving your CTR, you can increase the visibility and reach of your posts on Xiaohongshu.

Title: Engagement Metrics: Likes, Saves, and Comments
Content: Engagement metrics such as likes, saves, and comments play a vital role in determining the success of your posts on Xiaohongshu. Once users click on your post, the next step is to engage them enough to like, save, or comment. Each of these actions signals to the platform that your content is valuable. Saves are particularly important because they indicate that users find your content useful and want to refer back to it later. This is often the case with 'dry goods' content, which provides practical tips or valuable information. Comments are also highly valuable as they increase user interaction time, which is a key metric for all social media platforms. Encouraging comments can be achieved by asking questions, prompting users to share their experiences, or creating content that elicits strong opinions. Likes are generally easier to obtain but are less impactful than saves and comments. By focusing on these engagement metrics, you can improve the overall performance of your posts and increase their chances of being promoted by the platform.

Title: Conversion and Sales Impact on Content Promotion
Content: Conversion and sales are critical factors that influence content promotion on Xiaohongshu. The platform, like many others, operates as an advertising company that benefits from successful transactions. When your content leads to sales, it signals to the platform that your post is effective and valuable. This increases the likelihood of your content being pushed to a larger audience. For instance, if your post has a conversion rate of over 1%, it indicates that your product is appealing and has a high potential for sales. This makes the platform more inclined to promote your content. To achieve high conversion rates, ensure that your product descriptions are clear, your pricing is competitive, and your call-to-action is compelling. Additionally, analyzing your data to understand which posts lead to the most conversions can help you refine your strategy. By focusing on conversion and sales, you can enhance the effectiveness of your content and increase its reach on Xiaohongshu.
